author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

RNTupleInputFile now behaves like RootFile in case where the requested file is missing.

#### PR validation:

Tested on a RelVal workflow which had a misconfigured file name. Now properly reports that the file is missing.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1350
title: Properly handle missing RNTuple file
